organisation_name: Näkemisen ja silmäterveyden toimiala ry - Finnish Association of Vision and Eyecare (NÄE)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
-European Council of Optometry and Optics, www.ecoo.info 
-Finnish Commerce Federation, www.kauppa.fi 
-Federation of Finnish Enterprises
goals__remit:
NÄE is a branch association for vision & eyecare/optical services; for optical chains, individual optometrists and private eye clinics. It is active in fields of business policy, healthcare policy, professional development and renewal of service models. 
 
Over 80% of Finnish eyecare enterprises are members of NÄE.
